content.original: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. For 'Mechs, the engine rating is the mathematical product of the mass of the vehicle and its desired maximum walking or cruising velocity.
content.prevOriginal: Fusion engines function by harnessing the power of a fusion reaction, running on light hydrogen and protium. Fusion engines are defined by their engine rating. For 'Mechs, the engine rating is the mathematical product of the mass of the vehicle and its desired maximum walking or cruising velocity.
content.content: 聚变引擎的功能是以轻氢和钚为燃料获得聚变反应的能量. 聚变引擎根据其引擎额定功率区分.对于机甲来说,引擎额定功率是其重量和最大步行或巡航速度的数学乘积.

For 'Mechs, the engine rating is the mathematical product of the mass of the vehicle and its desired maximum walking or cruising velocity.

content.original: ProtoMechs mass between two to fifteen metric tons and stand anywhere from four to six meters in height, with the cockpit mounted in the upper chest. With their fusion engines, they can move considerably faster than battle armor but are more compact than BattleMechs. The ultimate goal of these machines is for a Point of five, working in unison, to be as effective as a BattleMech, while requiring less than half the amount of construction resources.
content.prevOriginal: ProtoMechs mass between two to fifteen metric tons and stand anywhere from four to six meters in height, with the cockpit mounted in the upper chest. With their fusion engines, they can move considerably faster than battle armor but are more compact than BattleMechs. The ultimate goal of these machines is for a Point of five, working in unison, to be as effective as a BattleMech, while requiring less than half the amount of construction resources.
content.content: 原人机甲在2到15吨之间,高度在4到6米之间,座舱安装在上胸部.拥有核聚变引擎,它们可以比战斗装甲移动得快得多,但比战斗机甲更紧凑.这些机器经常5个单位协调工作,像战斗机甲一样有效,而且只需要不到一半的构建资源.

content.original: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Cockpit, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.prevOriginal: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Cockpit, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.content: 所有的机甲都装备了可以通过升级来提升表现的座舱.
头部被命中时,驾驶员不再受伤

content.original: The gyro helps establish center-of-mass equilibrium for the BattleMech.
content.prevOriginal: The gyro helps establish center-of-mass equilibrium for the BattleMech.
content.content: 陀螺仪有助于机甲稳定重心

content.original: PASSIVE: Attacking with a single weapon ignores COVER and GUARDED on the target.
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: Attacking with a single weapon ignores COVER and GUARDED on the target.
content.content: 被动:使用单武器攻击时忽略目标的遮蔽和守备状态.

content.original: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Cockpit, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.prevOriginal: All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Cockpit, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.content: 所有的机甲都装备了可以通过升级来提升表现的座舱.
头部被命中时,驾驶员不再受伤

content.prevOriginal: The gyro helps establish center-of-mass equilibrium for the BattleMech.
content.content: 陀螺仪有助于机甲稳定重心

content.original: PASSIVE: Attacking with a single weapon ignores COVER and GUARDED on the target.
content.prevOriginal: PASSIVE: Attacking with a single weapon ignores COVER and GUARDED on the target.
content.content: 被动:使用单武器攻击时忽略目标的遮蔽和守备状态.

content.original: It was not until the development of the Enhanced Imaging (EI) system by Clan scientists that the ProtoMech concept became a viable one. The EI control system laid the groundwork needed by Smoke Jaguar scientists for controlling the ProtoMech. The ability to give the pilot direct neural control eliminated the need for a gyroscope and full-sized cockpit. This gave room for the pilot to ride in the torso while still allowing ample space for weapons.
content.prevOriginal: It was not until the development of the Enhanced Imaging (EI) system by Clan scientists that the ProtoMech concept became a viable one. The EI control system laid the groundwork needed by Smoke Jaguar scientists for controlling the ProtoMech. The ability to give the pilot direct neural control eliminated the need for a gyroscope and full-sized cockpit. This gave room for the pilot to ride in the torso while still allowing ample space for weapons.
content.content: 直到氏族科学家开发了增强成像(EI)系统原技机甲术概念才成为可行的概念.EI控制系统奠定了烟虎氏族科学家控制原人机甲所需的基础.给驾驶员直接神经控制的能力消除了对陀螺仪和全尺寸座舱的需求.这给了驾驶员在躯干上骑行的空间,同时也给武器留出了足够的空间.

content.original: This unit can use its movement before or after shooting.
content.prevOriginal: This unit can use its movement before or after shooting.
content.content: 该单位在射击前后都可以移动.

content.original: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from movement actions (up to its maximum).
content.prevOriginal: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from movement actions (up to its maximum).
content.content: 该单位从移动中获得额外的闪避(直到最大值).
突破射击, 提高精度/后座

content.original: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from movement actions (up to its maximum).
content.prevOriginal: This unit generates an extra EVASIVE charge from movement actions (up to its maximum).
content.content: 该单位从移动中获得额外的闪避(直到最大值).

content.original: The Guardian ECM Suite was introduced in 2597 by Johnston Industries of the Terran Hegemony. Designed to interfere with guided weaponry, targeting computers, and communication systems, the Guardian was typically used to shield allied units from such equipment by emitting a broad-band signal meant to confuse radar, infrared, ultraviolet, magscan and sonar sensors.
content.prevOriginal: The Guardian ECM Suite was introduced in 2597 by Johnston Industries of the Terran Hegemony. Designed to interfere with guided weaponry, targeting computers, and communication systems, the Guardian was typically used to shield allied units from such equipment by emitting a broad-band signal meant to confuse radar, infrared, ultraviolet, magscan and sonar sensors.
content.content: 守护者ECM套件于2597年由人类霸权的约翰斯顿工业公司推出.旨在干扰制导武器、目标电脑和通讯系统,守护者通常用发射宽频信号的方法来干扰雷达、红外、紫外、磁扫描和声呐传感器,进而保护盟友免受此类设备的影响.

content.original: An Actuator is a component within a BattleMech's limbs, composed of the joint, myomer bundles, and motor control units.
content.prevOriginal: An Actuator is a component within a BattleMech's limbs, composed of the joint, myomer bundles, and motor control units.
content.content: 伺服机构是战斗装甲肢体的一个组件,由关节、人工肌肉纤维和肌肉运动控制单元组成.

content.original: This is a physical weapon and uses those melee rules.
content.prevOriginal: This is a physical weapon and uses those melee rules.
content.content: 这是一把实体武器,使用近战规则.

content.original: This physical weapon ignores actuator damage.
content.prevOriginal: This physical weapon ignores actuator damage.
content.content: 这个实体武器忽略伺服机构的伤害.
实体武器忽略伺服机构的伤害

content.original: Deadweight item representing 1 ProtoMech heatsink for point
content.prevOriginal: Deadweight item representing 1 ProtoMech heatsink for point
content.content: 死重项代表一个原人机甲散热器点

content.original: The Beagle Active Probe (BAP) is a suite of enhancement technology that, when attached to general electronic sensors, enables the equipped unit to detect and classify other battlefield units whether they are camouflaged or even shut down, with the exception of conventional infantry. The Clans never 'lost' the technology, but dispensed with the 'Beagle' surname when they polished the concept.
content.prevOriginal: The Beagle Active Probe (BAP) is a suite of enhancement technology that, when attached to general electronic sensors, enables the equipped unit to detect and classify other battlefield units whether they are camouflaged or even shut down, with the exception of conventional infantry. The Clans never 'lost' the technology, but dispensed with the 'Beagle' surname when they polished the concept.
content.content: 猎兔犬主动探测器(BAP)是一套增强技术,当接入通用电子传感器时,装备的单位能够检测和区分除常规步兵外的其他战场单位,无论他们是伪装或关闭.氏族从未'失去'过这项技术,但在完善该概念设备时放弃了'猎兔犬'的名字.

content.original: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.prevOriginal: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.content: 降低隐身和ECM护罩单元的效果

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息

content.original: Protomech Myomer Booster is essentialy a Proto-scaled version of MASC
content.prevOriginal: Protomech Myomer Booster is essentialy a Proto-scaled version of MASC
content.content: 原人机甲人工肌肉加速器本质上是MASC的原人机甲缩放版
原人机甲人工肌肉加速器
人工肌肉加速信号电路(MASC)

content.original: The partial wing system offers increased jump capability. In addition, its large surface area allows a 'Mech to more efficiently radiate excess heat.
content.prevOriginal: The partial wing system offers increased jump capability. In addition, its large surface area allows a 'Mech to more efficiently radiate excess heat.
content.content: 偏翼系统提供了更高的跳跃能力.此外,其大的表面积允许机甲更有效的辐射多余热量.

content.original: The Partial Wing System increases Jump Jet jump distance by 30%
content.prevOriginal: The Partial Wing System increases Jump Jet jump distance by 30%
content.content: 这偏翼系统提升30%跳跃推进器跳跃的距离.

content.original: Basically still Electronics Counter Measures that scrambles Enemy Targeting and Missile Systems, though less elegant because it simply sends ancient Heavy Metal and Rock over any and all frequencies, even IR and Magnetic...
content.prevOriginal: Basically still Electronics Counter Measures that scrambles Enemy Targeting and Missile Systems, though less elegant because it simply sends ancient Heavy Metal and Rock over any and all frequencies, even IR and Magnetic...
content.content: 基本上仍是电子对抗措施(ECM),可以干扰敌人的瞄准和导弹系统,但不太优雅,因为它只是在任何可能的频率上发送古老的重金属摇滚,而不是红外和磁...

content.original: The ProtoMech Quad Melee Weapon System (MWS) was first developed in 3064 by The Society. Similar in purpose to the Talons and Claws used in the Solaris VII arenas, the Melee Weapon System is designed to add damage to a ProtoMech's physical attacks. First deployed in 3066 the Melee Weapon System is added to ProtoMechs as a series of claws, tusks, talons, horns, or slashing tail. These modifications are more than cosmetic, inflicting damage on enemy units. Another benefit however is how their appearance can affect enemy troops.
content.prevOriginal: The ProtoMech Quad Melee Weapon System (MWS) was first developed in 3064 by The Society. Similar in purpose to the Talons and Claws used in the Solaris VII arenas, the Melee Weapon System is designed to add damage to a ProtoMech's physical attacks. First deployed in 3066 the Melee Weapon System is added to ProtoMechs as a series of claws, tusks, talons, horns, or slashing tail. These modifications are more than cosmetic, inflicting damage on enemy units. Another benefit however is how their appearance can affect enemy troops.
content.content:
原人机甲四足近战武器系统(MWS)是3064年由氏族科学家学会首次开发.与索拉里斯VII竞技场中使用的爪子的目的相似,该武器系统为了增加原人机甲的实体攻击伤害而设计.
在3066年第一次应用于实战.近战武器系统是作为一系列的爪子,獠牙,鹰爪,角,或砍杀尾添加到原人机甲中.这些改装不仅仅是装饰上的,而是可以对敌方单位造成伤害.另一个好处是它们的外观会影响敌军.
原人机甲四足近战武器系统

content.original: This is a physical weapon and uses those melee rules.
content.prevOriginal: This is a physical weapon and uses those melee rules.
content.content: 这是一把实体武器,使用近战规则.

content.original: ProtoMechs mass between two to fifteen metric tons and stand anywhere from four to six meters in height, with the cockpit mounted in the upper chest. With their fusion engines, they can move considerably faster than battle armor but are more compact than BattleMechs. The ultimate goal of these machines is for a Point of five, working in unison, to be as effective as a BattleMech, while requiring less than half the amount of construction resources.
content.prevOriginal: ProtoMechs mass between two to fifteen metric tons and stand anywhere from four to six meters in height, with the cockpit mounted in the upper chest. With their fusion engines, they can move considerably faster than battle armor but are more compact than BattleMechs. The ultimate goal of these machines is for a Point of five, working in unison, to be as effective as a BattleMech, while requiring less than half the amount of construction resources.
content.content: 原人机甲在2到15吨之间,高度在4到6米之间,座舱安装在上胸部.拥有核聚变引擎,它们可以比战斗装甲移动得快得多,但比战斗机甲更紧凑.这些机器经常5个单位协调工作,像战斗机甲一样有效,而且只需要不到一半的构建资源.

content.original: Provides a penalty to all attacks against this unit.
content.prevOriginal: Provides a penalty to all attacks against this unit.
content.content: 对该单位的所有攻击提供惩罚.

content.original: ProtoMechs mass between two to fifteen metric tons and stand anywhere from four to six meters in height, with the cockpit mounted in the upper chest. With their fusion engines, they can move considerably faster than battle armor but are more compact than BattleMechs. The ultimate goal of these machines is for a Point of five, working in unison, to be as effective as a BattleMech, while requiring less than half the amount of construction resources. Quad Protomechs gets a bonus speed compared to their bipedal counterparts.

content.original: Originally developed by The Society for their experimental ProtoMechs, the Extended Jump Jet system boosts the thrust output of each jet at the cost of overall weight of the assembly.
content.prevOriginal: Originally developed by The Society for their experimental ProtoMechs, the Extended Jump Jet system boosts the thrust output of each jet at the cost of overall weight of the assembly.
content.content: 最初是由氏族科学家学会为他们的实验原机甲人开发的,拓展跳跃推进器系统以提高组件的总重量为代价增强了每个推进器的推力输出.

content.original: Introduced by Clan Blood Spirit in 3073, these Protomech sized Autocannons provide the punch of their bigger brothers but remain small enough to fit on protomechs. Uses Proto AC2 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Introduced by Clan Blood Spirit in 3073, these Protomech sized Autocannons provide the punch of their bigger brothers but remain small enough to fit on protomechs. Uses Proto AC2 Ammo.
content.content: 由血灵氏族于3073年引入,这些和原人机甲大小匹配的自动加农炮有他们的大兄弟的打击力度,但仍然足够小,适合原人机甲. 使用原人AC/2弹药.

content.original: Introduced by Clan Blood Spirit in 3073, these Protomech sized Autocannons provide the punch of their bigger brothers but remain small enough to fit on protomechs. Uses Proto AC4 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Introduced by Clan Blood Spirit in 3073, these Protomech sized Autocannons provide the punch of their bigger brothers but remain small enough to fit on protomechs. Uses Proto AC4 Ammo.
content.content: 由血灵氏族于3073年引入,这些和原人机甲大小匹配的自动加农炮有他们的大兄弟的打击力度,但仍然足够小,适合原人机甲. 使用原人AC/4弹药.

content.original: Introduced by Clan Blood Spirit in 3073, these Protomech sized Autocannons provide the punch of their bigger brothers but remain small enough to fit on protomechs. Uses Proto AC8 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Introduced by Clan Blood Spirit in 3073, these Protomech sized Autocannons provide the punch of their bigger brothers but remain small enough to fit on protomechs. Uses Proto AC8 Ammo.
content.content: 由血灵氏族于3073年引入,这些和原人机甲大小匹配的自动加农炮有他们的大兄弟的打击力度,但仍然足够小,适合原人机甲. 使用原人AC/8弹药.

content.original: Electric Discharge ProtoMech Armor was developed by Scientist Glenneth of Clan Fire Mandrill in 3066. By 3071 the Mandrills and The Society had perfected the armor. To maximize the damage generated by a ProtoMech's physical attack, Glenneth wove a series of compound capacitors through the armor. These capacitors draw power from the ProtoMech's fusion engine, storing an electrical charge. When a ProtoMech with EDP armor performs a physical attack the capacitors discharge and subject the target to a taser-like effect.
content.prevOriginal: Electric Discharge ProtoMech Armor was developed by Scientist Glenneth of Clan Fire Mandrill in 3066. By 3071 the Mandrills and The Society had perfected the armor. To maximize the damage generated by a ProtoMech's physical attack, Glenneth wove a series of compound capacitors through the armor. These capacitors draw power from the ProtoMech's fusion engine, storing an electrical charge. When a ProtoMech with EDP armor performs a physical attack the capacitors discharge and subject the target to a taser-like effect.
content.content: 原人机甲放电装甲(EDP)是由火山魈氏族的科学家格伦尼斯于3066年开发.到3071年,火山魈和科学家学会已经完善了该装甲.为了最大化原人机甲的实体攻击的伤害,格伦尼斯在装甲上混合编织了一系列复合电容器.这些电容器从原人机甲的聚变引擎中汲取能量,储存电能,当一个拥有EDP装甲的原人机甲进行物理攻击时,电容器放电并使目标受到类似泰瑟枪的效果.

content.original: The Mech's Systems have been scrambled.
content.prevOriginal: The Mech's Systems have been scrambled.

content.original: Designed by Clan Coyote in 3068 as a way to integrate the Advanced Tactical Missile System on ProtoMechs. While many sacrifices had to be made to fit it on Protomechs. While it can use any type of ATM and IATM ammo but it only carries a single reload.
content.prevOriginal: Designed by Clan Coyote in 3068 as a way to integrate the Advanced Tactical Missile System on ProtoMechs. While many sacrifices had to be made to fit it on Protomechs. While it can use any type of ATM and IATM ammo but it only carries a single reload.
content.content: 由丛林狼氏族于3068年设计,作为一种将先进战术导弹系统集成在原人机甲上的方法.但为了把它装在原人机甲的肢体上,必须做出许多牺牲.虽然它可以使用任何类型的ATM和IATM弹药,但它只携带重新装填一次的弹药.

content.original: A 'Mech sized chainsaw welded to a ProtoMech
content.prevOriginal: A 'Mech sized chainsaw welded to a ProtoMech
content.content: 一个和机甲尺寸匹配的电锯焊接到了原人机甲上

content.original: Someone welded two proto ac/2s together chopped off half the barrels hard wired it into the FCS systems, made it think it is a Ultra Autocannon and made it accept lbx ammo. Just another pirate having his way with this equipment boss. Only surprising thing is this doesn't seem like its just going to blow up but we wont be able to mount it to any 'Mechs or Proto's. Uses LBX2 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Someone welded two proto ac/2s together chopped off half the barrels hard wired it into the FCS systems, made it think it is a Ultra Autocannon and made it accept lbx ammo. Just another pirate having his way with this equipment boss. Only surprising thing is this doesn't seem like its just going to blow up but we wont be able to mount it to any 'Mechs or Proto's. Uses LBX2 Ammo.
content.content: 有人把两个原人AC/2焊接在一起,切掉一半的炮管,把它接驳到火控系统中,让它像是是一门终极自动加农炮,它可以使用LBX弹药.只是另一个海盗有它自己的主意,唯一令人惊讶的是它似乎不像是要炸掉,除非我们把它安装到任何'机甲'或'原人'上. 使用LBX2弹药

content.original: Originally made for ProtoMechs these odd tube count SRMs are identical to the normal variety in everything but tube count.
content.prevOriginal: Originally made for ProtoMechs these odd tube count SRMs are identical to the normal variety in everything but tube count.
content.content: 这些奇怪的管数SRM最初是为原人机甲制作,在所有方面都与正常品种相同,除了管数.

content.original: Made for ProtoMechs these odd tube count Streak SRMs are identical to the normal variety in everything but tube count. Uses Streak SRM Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Made for ProtoMechs these odd tube count Streak SRMs are identical to the normal variety in everything but tube count. Uses Streak SRM Ammo.
content.content: 这些奇怪的管数的迅捷SRM最初是为原人机甲制作,在所有方面都与正常品种相同,除了管数. 使用LBX2弹药
